author: vincenzo
msg: The AbstractStorageQuota matcher subclasses are unable to retrieve the amount of storage currently used in the recipient's inbox if the message's recipient name is an alias instead of being the primary name, and hence never match.
Fixed getUsed(MailAddress recipient, Mail _) adding a call to a new getPrimaryName(String originalUsername) method that hanles aliases.

author: hilmer
msg: Changed initial copyright year from 2000 to 1999

author: sbrewin
msg: Updated build.xml to copy ../apps/conf/james-fetchmail.xml and ../apps/conf/samples/james/*.xml to the .sar.

author: hilmer
msg: More information are made available through JMX.
.mxinfo files are autogenerated by the build process.
needed tools for mxinfo generation are added to tools/lib these jars obtained from Phoenix 4.0.3
